document.full_text: sandra gal won the kia classic on sunday to become the second german winner in lpga tour history, beating second-ranked jiyai shin with a 2-foot birdie putt on the final hole.
document.title: sandra gal wins kia classic
lines_and_colors: sandra gal won the kia classic on sunday to become the second german winner in lpga tour history, beating second-ranked jiyai shin with a 2-foot birdie putt on the final hole.
